description: Patagonia's Line Logo Ridge Stripe graphic reminds us that we find ourselves in the mountains. We work to protect the places we love and conserving resources is part of that. By utilizing fabric scraps and recycled bottles, we reduce our reliance on virgin raw materials. Inseam is 30 in.
name: Patagonia Line Logo Ridge Stripe Uprisal Sweatpants - Mens

specs.value: 11.5 oz 55% postconsumer recycled polyester, 45% recycled cotton knit fleece with a brushed back
